item.title: AI Ramifications Of Apple’s Google Play For Siri
item.description: Apple reportedly partners with Google Gemini to power future Apple Intelligence, shifting from in-house models.

item.title: Xreal And Viture’s Ugly Legal Fight Shines A Negative Light On XR
item.description: Xreal sued its main competitor, Viture, for patent infringement on its older XR glasses design, despite being named a lead partner for AndroidXR.

item.title: CES 2026 Shows That Competition Is Alive And Healthy Among PC Makers

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra: Leaked Before Launch, New Price Rise?
item.description: Samsung has accidentally leaked all new Galaxy S26 models weeks ahead of their launch.
